title: Champ jewels
body:
SO every day i buy this jewels
and only now i discover that i must spend 250RP in order to use them 0_o

and i cannot find where to buy the thing for them )-<0_o>-(

replies.body:
You can use the jewels to upgrade the Worlds 2016 Icon, which costs 1 IP in the store, or a team icon (if you're a fan of a specific team), which you can purchase in the store for 250 RP. Check out our [Worlds 2016 Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-) for complete details on this event.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I cannot find the 1ip icon in shop or i got it and i cannot find how to use to craft it

I took a look at your account and it looks like you've already crafted it with Championship Jewels. You should find it if you click on your summoner icon near the top of the client and select the Golden Worlds 2016 icon (which is the tier 2 icon).

Let me know if you were able to find it.
